tool_description: Imports and consolidates previous medical records from external sources, standardizing medical history data for integration into the current EHR system.

source_system.description: Source EHR system or healthcare provider name

record_format.description: Format of incoming records (HL7, FHIR, CCD, PDF, paper)

patient_consent.description: Patient has provided consent for record transfer

record_date_range.description: Date range of records to import [start_date, end_date]

previous_provider_name.description: Name of the previous healthcare provider

record_types.description: Types of records to import (lab_results, medications, allergies, procedures, diagnoses, imaging)

quality_threshold.description: Minimum quality score for record acceptance (0-1)

include_notes.description: Include clinical notes and narrative text

error_messages: Invalid record format: Supported formats are HL7, FHIR, CCD, PDF, and paper.
Consent not provided: Patient consent is required for medical record import.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid dates.
Unsupported record type: Valid types are lab_results, medications, allergies, procedures, diagnoses, imaging.
Source system unavailable: Unable to connect to the specified source EHR system.
Data quality too low: Records do not meet the minimum quality threshold.
Import timeout: Record import process exceeded time limits.
Format conversion error: Unable to convert records from source format to target format.
usage: Specify source_system, record_format, patient_consent status, record_date_range, previous_provider_name, and record_types. Set optional parameters for import customization. Returns import status and consolidated medical history summary.

records_failed.description: Number of records that failed to import

quality_score.description: Overall quality score of imported records (0-1)

import_summary.description: Summary of imported medical history data

conflicts_detected.description: List of data conflicts requiring manual review
